src:
Beberapa 'Keanehan' yang Disorot Media di Laga Barcelona vs Slavia Praha
06 Nov 2019, 11:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bermain di depan pendukung sendiri nyatanya belum mampu membantu Barcelona meraih kemenangan. Menjamu Slavia Praha, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB, Lionel Messi dkk hanya mampu bermain imbang tanpa gol.
Raksasa Spanyol itu harus puas dengan hasil imbang 0-0 kala berhadapan dengan klub asal Ceko tersebut. Meski disebut tim yang tidak diunggulkan, Slavia Praha berhasil melakukan perlawanan sengit sepanjang laga.
Klub berjuluk Cervenobili tersebut bahkan hampir saja merobek gawang Barca pada menit ke-16. Sayang, tendangan Lukas Masopust berhasil dtepis dengan baik oleh kiper Barca, Marc-Andre ter Stegen.
Barca sendiri bukan tanpa perlawanan. Lionel Messi dan kawan-kawan memiliki sejumlah peluang untuk unggul. Sayangnya, skuat racikan Ernesto Valverde itu tidak mampu memanfaatkan peluang yang didapat.
Meski demikian, ada yang menarik dari laga yang mempertemukan dua klub tersebut. Melansir Live Soccer TV, Rabu (6/11/2019), penggemar Barcelona mulai mendiskusikan teori konspirasi yang melibatkan Lionel Messi dengan Antoine Griezmann.
Selain rahasia di balik hubungan antara Lionel Messi dan Antoine Griezmann, beberapa keanehan ini juga ramai disoroti media-media internasional.
text:
Some of the 'Oddities' that Media Highlighted at Barcelona vs Slavia Prague Game
Nov 6 2019, 11:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Playing in front of his own supporters in fact have not been able to help Barcelona win. Entertaining Slavia Prague, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs, Lionel Messi et al are only able to play a goalless draw.
The Spanish giant must be satisfied with a 0-0 draw when dealing with the Czech club. Despite being called the unseeded team, Slavia Prague managed to put up a fierce resistance throughout the match.
The club nicknamed Cervenobili almost even tore the goal of Barca in the 16th minute. Unfortunately, Lukas Masopust's kick was saved well by Barca goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen.
Barca itself is not without resistance. Lionel Messi and his friends have a number of opportunities to excel. Unfortunately, Ernesto Valverde's squad wasn't able to take advantage of the opportunities they got.
However, there is something interesting about the match that brought the two clubs together. Launch Live Soccer TV, Wednesday (11/06/2019), Barcelona fans began discussing conspiracy theories involving Lionel Messi with Antoine Griezmann.
In addition to the secret behind the relationship between Lionel Messi and Antoine Griezmann, some of these oddities are also highlighted by international media.
